EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
New Look Customer Service Workshop
Want to learn from New Look employers what Customer Service really means? Want to develop an understanding of the New Look brand and values, to help you prepare for your interview?
Then come along to the New Look Workshop on 21st March at City Hall! Just click the link below to claim your place.
We'll be covering: - What Customer Service means, and its financial & social value - New Look's core values and how they influence customer experience - How New Look defines and adapts to its key customers
This is invaluable preparation for the upcoming interviews but spaces are limited, so make sure you book your place now using the links below.
***
Please note, for those wishing to attend a Lloyds Bank interview there will be a special Lloyds workshop in April. Please keep an eye on your emails for further information.
***
Click on a link below to reserve your place at the New Look workshops:
Saturday 21st March, 9:45am - 12:30pm Saturday 21st March, 12:45pm - 3:30pm
This workshop has been developed in partnership with New Look and will provide you with the opportunity to identify key qualities that contribute to good customer service. We strongly recommend you attend this workshop to help prepare you for your interview.
***
Please note there are only 30 places in each workshop. If you cannot attend do not reserve a space as you will be taking the place from someone else.
Any questions? Email headstart@the-challenge.org
Keep up the volunteering, you are all making a huge difference.
